collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-documentation Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-documentation skill

test_items.name: documentation-search-relevance
test_items.description: Validates ability to find and reference correct FeatBit documentation for user queries
test_items.input_task_prompt: Where can I find documentation about FeatBit's targeting rules? I want to learn how to create percentage rollouts.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- Provides official docs URL
- References targeting rules section
- May provide direct link to percentage rollout docs
- Explains what targeting rules are
- Mentions docs.featbit.co domain
- May suggest related topics

Evaluation Method:
1. Check if docs.featbit.co referenced
2. Verify targeting rules mentioned
3. Confirm URL validity (if provided)
4. Check explanation accuracy
5. Verify relevance to percentage rollouts

Pass Criteria:
- Official documentation referenced
- Correct section identified
- Accurate explanation
- Valid URL if provided
- Relevant to query

Fail Criteria:
- Wrong documentation site
- Incorrect section
- Broken links
- Irrelevant content

test_items.name: documentation-sdk-faq-reference
test_items.description: Validates ability to direct users to SDK FAQ for common questions like getting environment secrets
test_items.input_task_prompt: How do I get my FeatBit environment secret? Where do I find the SDK URLs?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- References SDK FAQ documentation
- URL: https://docs.featbit.co/sdk/faq
- Explains environment secret location in FeatBit portal
- Mentions SDK URLs section
- May provide step-by-step portal navigation

Evaluation Method:
1. Check if SDK FAQ mentioned
2. Verify URL correctness
3. Confirm environment secret explained
4. Check SDK URLs addressed
5. Verify portal navigation if included

Pass Criteria:
- SDK FAQ referenced
- Correct URL provided
- Both questions answered
- Clear instructions
- Portal navigation clear

Fail Criteria:
- Wrong documentation
- Broken URL
- Missing answer to either question
- Unclear instructions
